#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define gx getchar
#define mod 1000000007;
#define DBG(vari) cerr<<#vari<<" ==> "<<(vari)<<endl;

typedef long long i64;

i64  ans,t,l,p,i,m,k,st[50],en[50],d,part[105][35],a,b,j,bed[1234567],tt=0,tmp[1234567];;
int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    //freopen("inp.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
    //i64  ans,t,l,p,i,m,k,st[50],en[50],d,part[105][35],a,b,j,bed[35],tt=0,tmp[35];;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
		tt++;
		memset(bed,0,sizeof bed);
		
		cin>>k>>m;
		for(i=0;i<k;i++){
			cin>>st[i]>>en[i];
		}	
			
		ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<m;i++){
			cin>>d;
			for(j=0;j<d;j++){
				cin>>a>>b;
				for(l=st[a-1];l<=en[a-1];l++){
					bed[l]+=b;
					ans=max(ans,bed[l]);
				}
			}
		}
		
		cout<<"Case "<<tt<<": "<<ans<<endl;
	}
    return 0;
}
